thread.section_title: Ink Station Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ink Station | inkstation.com.au
thread.title: Susanne Blaschka
thread.title_full: Ink Station reviewed by Susanne Blaschka

author: Susanne Blaschka
title: Susanne Blaschka
text:
Have been a customer for a long time, always received efficient and quick service. This time the delivery instructions were ignored and caused a great deal of inconvenience to me.
it appears there was some kind of communication problem?
Otherwise I am happy with Ink Station. But how can I be sure this kind of mix-up does not happen again in future?
